solution_line_template: The number of rolls already sold is {grandmother_rolls} + {uncle_rolls} + {neighbor_rolls} = <<{grandmother_rolls}+{uncle_rolls}+{neighbor_rolls}={rolls_sold_initial}>>{rolls_sold_initial}.
Nellie needs to sell {total_needed_rolls} - {rolls_sold_initial} = {rolls_remaining_to_sell} more rolls of gift wrap.
